message.body: I am here
I wrote a paragraph in the telegram chat
im going to copy and paste it
Also is this instant? or does it Quene up the posts and then send em?

Currently from my understanding, users can submit contnet because they are given permission within the network.. but how can we put validations in place for content submissions... for my own example I'm making a button where each click/tap gets added to the users profile, but anyone can just tell the network they clicked the button a billion times. Would it be possible to add somekind of check amongst the peers that validate each tap
Another example would be a chess game, how can we have the peers validate each move, so a pawn doesnt just TP across the board and kill the queen
Perfect we understand each other, any ideas on how such a problem would be fixed?
that can be faked as well? cant it? the user.json is essentially under their own controll, they can write anything they want
thats actually pretty fun haha
Security by obscurity
its not a long term solution...
Why do we need markets?
This Q is really annoying
what u mean?
its obstructed
Anyway, do u think there is any way rn to prevent user manipulating data? somehow validate stuff
Not enough to say I'm comfortable with them, but how bitcoin validates transactions throughout the network is my limited understanding
ya i noticed a lot of nonce refrences, but i havent really read the source code to understand all of it... when u say bitcoin address's... from my understanding it uses the same encryption method
the user in the end has complete control over his user.json file
BTW how do i find my user hash?
like in the data/users folder of sites, which one is me
@bot@zid that didnt seem to show me anything
oh i think i found what u meant
i didnt seem to find my hash :(
Not surehow u figured it out... but thanks!!!
We can edit our messages and data_added, security is a problem currnetly with ZeroNet!!!
Look a few messages down
Editing messages and timestamp is possible
undid *
but its obviously an issue
worse then this q
guys i just realized, if i copy and paste in my json file... i can flood the chat
how will a market help against hackers? im not understanding u
im going to go, nice talking to u bot
@bot@zid u here?
